name: Fresh Fruit Muffin
description: Muffin filled with seasonal fruit and topped with cinnamon sugar

name: Rocket Muffin
description: Made with banana puree, carrots, hazelnuts, and molasses, topped with a dollop of raspberry jam

name: Banana Ginger Muffin
description: Vegan muffin made with toasted walnuts, freshly grated ginger, and banana puree

name: Morning Glory Muffin
description: A supremely moist muffing loaded with pineapples, carrots, apples, coconut, walnuts, and raisins

name: Bluberry Scone
description: Delicious buttermilk scone studded with sweet, tangy blueberries laced with orange zest

name: Citrus Oat Scone
description: Special scone flavored with fresh orange zest and raisins

name: Cherry Almond Scone
description: Scottish scone made with currants, fresh orange zest, and a hint of anise

name: Morning Roll
description: Swirl of croissant sweetened with vanilla sugar and baked to a golden brown

name: Orange Hazelnut Pinwheel
description: Croissant rolled with roasted hazelnuts and topped with fresh orange glaze

name: Apple Turnover
description: A favorite any time of day featuring roasted Washington apples
